channel.title: Any1 know how 2 port forwars a siemens speedstream 4200 router?
channel.description:
hey i am trying to set up a no-ip adress .. but i cant figure out port forward plz help!!
here is a pic of the port forward screen-

item.dc:creator: @system system

@system wrote:

I have used the bloody site! … i just need help ffs! dont tell me to use a website cose it doseny explain for my router… and i need a tut for MY router cse its differrent!

item.title: Any1 know how 2 port forwars a siemens speedstream 4200 router?
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

As it has been posted before… go to www.portforward.com and find “Siemens” and look for the speedstream-4200, then follow it from there, it isn’t that hard, only as hard as you make it. I have a Speedstream-6520 router, and I got it port-forwarded without using that site. Just use the site, it’s pretty much step by step of what to do.

Read full topic
